block.p: $600,000 176 Broadway (Maiden Lane) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar loft building; dining area, open kitchen, 11-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors; common roof garden, laundry facilities on every floor; maintenance $1,320, 64% tax-deductible; listed at $615,000, 11 weeks on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate)

$600,000 176 Broadway (Maiden Lane) 2-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,350-sq.-ft. duplex co-op in a prewar loft building; dining area, open kitchen, 11-ft. ceilings, hardwood floors; common roof garden, laundry facilities on every floor; maintenance $1,320, 64% tax-deductible; listed at $615,000, 11 weeks on market (broker: Tabak Real Estate)

$400,000 60 East Eighth Street (Georgetown Plaza) 600-sq.-ft. studio co-op in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; newly renovated kitchen, hardwood floors, central air-conditioning; roof deck and pool in building; maintenance $776, 50% tax-deductible; listed at $385,000 (multiple bids), 10 weeks on market (broker: Douglas Elliman)

$462,500 529 West 42nd Street (Armory) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 1,100-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen; kitchen with new appliances, high ceilings, hardwood floors, floor-to-ceiling windows, eastern exposure; maintenance $745, 60% tax-deductible; listed at $495,000, 22 weeks on market (broker: Klara Madlin Real Estate)

$570,000 188 East 64th Street (Royale) 1-bedroom, 1-bath, 750-sq.-ft. condo in a postwar building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; kitchen with dishwasher, marble bath, hardwood floors, central air-conditioning; health club in building; common charge $534; taxes $4,596; listed at $590,000, 21 weeks on market (broker: Peter Ashe)

$999,000 123 West 74th Street 2-bedroom, 2-bath, 1,500-sq.-ft. co-op in a prewar building; dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen, high beamed ceilings, hardwood floors, new oversize windows, southern and western exposures, washer/dryer in unit; maintenance $1,117, 31% tax-deductible; listed at $975,000 (multiple bids), 2 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group)

$612,000 9471 Ridge Boulevard 3-bedroom, 1 1/2-bath, 74-year-old semiattached brick house; dining area, eat-in kitchen, full basement; shared driveway, 1-car garage, 26-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $4,100; listed at $695,000, 12 weeks on market (broker: Century 21/Block & Lot)

$765,000 57 Second Street 2-family, 3-story town house built in 1901; 3 bedrooms, 2 baths in primary unit; 2 bedrooms, 1 bath in other; dining room, eat-in kitchen, tin ceilings, hardwood floors in each; rear garden, 17-by-78-ft. lot; taxes $1,790; listed at $789,000, 5 weeks on market (broker: Iron Gate Properties)

$2.04 million 568 First Street 8-bedroom, 3-bath, 4-story attached brownstone; dining room, renovated kitchen, stained-glass windows, English basement, original moldings and detail; rear garden, 20-by-100-ft. lot; taxes $5,757; listed at $2.5 million, 25 weeks on market (broker: Townsley & Gay Real Estate)

$1.3 million 700 Pacific Street (Newswalk) 3-bedroom, 3-bath, 2,575-sq.-ft. penthouse condo in a renovated prewar industrial building; 24-hr. doormen, concierge; dining room, windowed eat-in kitchen with stainless-steel appliances, whirlpool bath, central air-conditioning, interior stairs to 3,000-sq.-ft. private roof deck; common charge $919; 100% tax-abated; listed at $1.5 million, 8 weeks on market (broker: Corcoran Group Brooklyn)

$655,000 151-35 24th Avenue 4-bedroom, 3-bath, 50-year-old split-level-style house; dining room, eat-in kitchen, renovated baths, finished basement; new roof and windows, 1-car garage, 45-by-97-ft. lot; taxes $3,300; listed at $685,000, 14 weeks on market (broker: PCA Realty)

$701,000 20 Hunt Street 4-bedroom, 2-bath, antique Victorian-style farmhouse built in 1890; front porch with gingerbread molding, dining room, renovated eat-in kitchen and baths, family room, fireplace, stained-glass window; 0.23-acre lot; taxes $6,524; listed at $715,000, 4 weeks on market (broker: Prudential Connecticut Realty)
